# Module Easy stats

This module allows users to carry out descriptive analyses like PCA, and boxplots associated with statistical tests

## Input Data

Users can drag and drops quantification file and metadata file in the corresponding fields. 

Filters and tranformations can be applied on dataset. 

Merge datasets button makes the dataset ready for further analysis.


## PCA

In this submodule, the dataset is preprocessed to handle missing values. User can choose which component to display.
